abilities.name: Groundbreaker
abilities.description: Deal 81 damage to enemies in an area. Heroes hit on the outer edge are Stunned for 0.75 seconds and then Slowed by 30% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Bloodthirst
abilities.description: Deal 156 damage to an enemy and heal for 10% of Garrosh's missing Health. Healing is increased by 100% against Heroes.

abilities.name: Wrecking Ball
abilities.description: Throw a nearby enemy Hero, Minion, or Mercenary to the target location, dealing 91 damage to enemies near the impact and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

heroics.name: Warlord's Challenge
heroics.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

heroics.name: Decimate
heroics.description: Deal 50 damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 30% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second. Stores up to 3 charges.

original.name: Garrosh
original.title: Son of Hellscream
original.description: As the new warchief of the Horde, Garrosh is a proud and vicious warrior who rules with an iron fist. His hatred for the Alliance burns like wildfire, and he will stop at nothing to destroy them. By his axe, the orcs will reclaim their rightful glory.
original.shortDescription: A frontline Tank that enters the fray, trying to isolate a single opponent for elimination.

baseHeroInfo.name: Garrosh
baseHeroInfo.title: Son of Hellscream
baseHeroInfo.description: As the new warchief of the Horde, Garrosh is a proud and vicious warrior who rules with an iron fist. His hatred for the Alliance burns like wildfire, and he will stop at nothing to destroy them. By his axe, the orcs will reclaim their rightful glory.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A frontline Tank that enters the fray, trying to isolate a single opponent for elimination.

trait.name: Armor Up
trait.description: Garrosh gains 1 Armor for every 2% of maximum Health missing.

abilities.name: Groundbreaker
abilities.description: Deal 81 damage to enemies in an area. Heroes hit on the outer edge are Stunned for 0.75 seconds and then Slowed by 30% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Bloodthirst
abilities.description: Deal 156 damage to an enemy and heal for 10% of Garrosh's missing Health. Healing is increased by 100% against Heroes.

abilities.name: Wrecking Ball
abilities.description: Throw a nearby enemy Hero, Minion, or Mercenary to the target location, dealing 91 damage to enemies near the impact and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Warlord's Challenge
heroicAbilities.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Decimate
heroicAbilities.description: Deal 50 damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 30% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second. Stores up to 3 charges.

otherAbilities.name: Into the Fray
otherAbilities.description: Activate to throw a nearby ally and grant them 25 Armor for 3 seconds. Deals 91 damage to nearby enemies upon impact and Slows them by 30% for 2.5 seconds. While in flight, allied Heroes are Unstoppable.

otherAbilities.name: Double Up
otherAbilities.description: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by 100% for 3 seconds.

skins.name: Son of Hellscream
skins.description: As the new warchief of the Horde, Garrosh is a proud and vicious warrior who rules with an iron fist. His hatred for the Alliance burns like wildfire, and he will stop at nothing to destroy them. By his axe, the orcs will reclaim their rightful glory.

skins.name: Mad Axe Garrosh
skins.description: Of all the biker gangs marauding the wastelands, none are as feared as the Warsong Outriders. Led by the mutant warlord Garrosh, the roar of their engines is the sound of death on wheels.
